title: 1983: the Cold War almost goes nuclear
itunes:title: 1983: the Cold War almost goes nuclear
itunes:subtitle: Historian and author Taylor Downing describes the events of the Able Archer scare, which nearly witnessed global Armageddon when the Soviets misread the intentions behind a NATO war exercise
description:
Historian and author Taylor Downing describes the events of the Able Archer scare, which nearly witnessed global Armageddon when the Soviets misread the intentions behind a NATO war exercise

Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
